strings.Value: "An empire of kobolds and trolls, unafraid of fire. They would make fine allies."
"Some allies. Turn your back and get half of your ass bitten off. Ha!"
"Then they make allies with stinky mites to avoid war. Peg them to the ground and be done with it."
"It would mean an alliance with evil. Hearing you speak the words, it becomes all the clearer."
"Well, if an undead elf can be an ally, then why not kobolds and trolls as well?"
